name: The Dude
description: This is a men’s cardigan knit in Cascade Yarns Ecological Wool using stranded color work. It’s worked all in 1x1 rib and has a zipper closure and a short row shawl collar.
full_text: This is a men’s cardigan knit in Cascade Yarns Ecological Wool using stranded color work. It’s worked all in 1x1 rib and has a zipper closure and a short row shawl collar. I also offer Dude-inspired patterns that are worked in the round in plain Stockinette stitch in unisex adult sizes: The Knitter’s Dude , and in baby and kids’ sizes: The Little Dude . They can be purchased separately or together in the ebook, The Royal We . Like my designs? Subscribe to my weekly newsletter to get updates, exclusive sales, and recommendations! Sizes and Finished Measurements Sizes: S (M, L, 1X, 2X) Chest Circumference: 36 (38,42,46, 50) in/91.5 (96.5, 106.75, 116.75, 127) cm Yarn Main Color: 1435 yd/1312 m bulky weight yarn Contrast Color 1: 478 yd/437 m bulky weight yarn Contrast Color 2: 478 yd/ 437 m bulky weight yarn Shown in Cascade Yarns Ecological Wool (100% wool; 478 yd/437 m per 250g skein) Main Color: Vanilla #8014; 3(3, 3,4, 4) skeins Contrast Color 1: Latte #8063; 1 skein Contrast Color 2: Ebony #8095 1 skein Blocked Gauge 21 sts/21 rows = 4in/10 cm in un-stretched 1x1 rib on US #10/6 mm needle Needles and Notions Needle Sizes are recommendations only. Always use needle size necessary to obtain gauge. US #10/6.00 mm 24-32 in/60-80 cm circular needle US#6/4.00 mm 24-32 in/60-80 cm circular needle US #4/3.55 mm 24-32 in/60-80 cm circular needle US #11/8.00mm 24-32 in/60-80 cm circular needle (optional – to maintain gauge over color charts) Circular needles are recommended because the project is quite heavy and circular needles will support this weight more effectively.
